functions.name: useMotion
functions.description: composable putting your components in motion.

functions.name: useMotionProperties
functions.description: useMotionProperties is used to access Motion Properties for a target element.

functions.name: useMotions
functions.description: useMotions is used to access the motion instances from v-motion directives declared from templates.

functions.name: useSpring
functions.description: useSpring is a simpler hook than useMotion.

functions.name: useMotionVariants
functions.description: useMotionVariants is used to handle the Variants state and selection.

functions.name: useMotionVariants
functions.description: useMotionVariants is used to handle the Variants state and selection.

functions.name: useMotionTransitions
functions.description: useMotionTransitions is used to handle the multiple animations created when you animate your elements.

functions.name: useMotionControls
functions.description: useMotionControls is used to create motion controls from motion properties and motion transitions.

functions.name: useMotionFeatures
functions.description: useMotionFeatures is used to register features such as variant sync, event listeners.

functions.name: useElementStyle
functions.description: useElementStyle is used to sync a reactive object to a target element CSS styling.

functions.name: useElementTransform
functions.description: useElementTransform is used to sync a reactive object to a target element CSS transform.
